trends: There have been 39 other sightings in Redding
There were no other sightings in Redding on or around November 21st 2008
Summary: It was a light-sphere type thing in the sky going in circles.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was walking home from the store with my brother and my friend and I looked up. The light caught my eye. At first I thought it was just my eye playing a trick on me. But then I looked back up and it was still there. Just to make sure,I asked my brother and my friend if they saw it to. They said they both saw it. We kept looking at it for like 5 minutes. It would go in a circle. But it would go behind clouds so I couldnt see it sometimes. I went to go get my parents so they could see but when I got back out,I was gone. My parents thought I was just playing a trick on them. When they went back inside, I saw it again. After that,I just went back inside. And that was all I saw. So I thought I should report this.
